question: In some parts of the world it is becoming popular to research the history of one’s own family.  Why might people want to do this?  Is it a positive or negative development?
text: In today’s global society, researching the ancestral past of the family is becoming famous.  Individuals wanted to do this in-order to know the inheritance of one’s own self.  In my opinion, researching and knowing about one’s own common trends with respect to ancient background has a positive outcome.

To begin with, searching out one’s own ancestral background will help to realize the skills, which is imported from our ancestors.  These skills can be utilized for growth in professional as well as personal life.  Additionally, these skills are hereditary, it can be interesting for people to know who all carrying these similar skill gets from previous generations.

Moreover, the most popular reason to find out about family history is often due to the curiosity of learning own’s origin.  This is because of the reason that, due to some families migrated abroad in order to reach good life, resulted in them losing their original culture and inherited the culture of the country they moved in.  This also holds people to learn the culture of their origin and the family background.

On the other hand, this is an advantageous trend of researching about the family background, which can also give confidence to the people with their history.  There are individuals who lack self-confidence, by knowing the ancestors skill, these citizens will regain the confidence in them.  For instance, people who are singers or orators, tends to get these skills from their past generation.
To summarise, learning about one’s own geographical  origin and skills are beneficial for the citizens from which they are originated.  This can also be fruitful in growing with future prospective.
